name: Captured Pigment
description:
Morris takes up his sword to retrieve color back to his home town, a journey filled with danger and adventure. Hack-and-slash your way toward the evil villain who stole all color and used it to create his army. Defeat the villains to bring back all the hues of color back to your town. 

Controls:
Keyboard/GamePad
Move: WASD/left stick
Look: Mouse/right stick
Evade: CTRL/south button
Block: Space/east button
Light Attack: Left click/west button
Heavy Attack: Right click/north button

Exit Game: ALT+F4
